name: google-spaces-updates
description: Post team updates to Google Chat Spaces via webhook. Supports deployment notifications, bug fixes, feature announcements, and questions. Reads config from .claude/settings.json, formats messages with rich formatting, and includes git context (commits, branches, changed files). Use when: post to team, notify team, update the team, after deployments, completing features, fixing bugs reported by team, or asking questions that need team input.
